extracted_playbook.title: Audit Remote Access Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Audit remote access tools on your network to identify currently used and/or authorized software.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Logs for Remote Access Software Execution
extracted_playbook.description: Review logs for execution of remote access software to detect abnormal use of programs running as a portable executable.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Security Software for Remote Access Detection
extracted_playbook.description: Use security software to detect instances of remote access software being loaded only in memory.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Remote Access Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Require authorized remote access solutions to be used only from within your network over approved remote access solutions, such as VPNs or VDIs.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Remote Access Software Ports and Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Block both inbound and outbound connections on common remote access software ports and protocols at the network perimeter.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Implement application controls to manage and control execution of software, including allowlisting remote access programs.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Use of RDP and Remote Desktop Services
extracted_playbook.description: Strictly limit the use of RDP and other remote desktop services. If RDP is necessary, rigorously apply best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Network for RDP Usage
extracted_playbook.description: Audit the network for systems using RDP.

extracted_playbook.title: Close Unused RDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Close unused RDP ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Account Lockouts
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce account lockouts after a specified number of attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Apply phishing-resistant multifactor authentication (MFA).

extracted_playbook.title: Log RDP Login Attempts
extracted_playbook.description: Log RDP login attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Command-Line and Scripting Activities
extracted_playbook.description: Disable command-line and scripting activities and permissions.

extracted_playbook.title: Review for New or Unrecognized Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Review domain controllers, servers, workstations, and active directories for new and/or unrecognized accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit User Accounts with Administrative Privileges
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls according to the principle of least privilege (PoLP).

extracted_playbook.title: Place Domain Admin Accounts in Protected Users Group
extracted_playbook.description: Place domain admin accounts in the protected users’ group to prevent caching of password hashes locally.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Storing Plaintext Credentials in Scripts
extracted_playbook.description: Refrain from storing plaintext credentials in scripts.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Time-Based Access for Admin Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Implement time-based access for accounts set at the admin level and higher.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement a Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a recovery plan to maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data and regularly maintain backup and restoration (daily or weekly at minimum).

extracted_playbook.title: Require Compliance with NIST Password Standards
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to comply with NIST's standards for developing and managing password policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Longer Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use longer passwords consisting of at least eight characters and no more than 64 characters in length.

extracted_playbook.title: Store Passwords in Hashed Format
extracted_playbook.description: Store passwords in hashed format using industry-recognized password managers.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Password User Salts
extracted_playbook.description: Add password user “salts” to shared login credentials.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Reusing Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid reusing passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Account Lockouts for Failed Login Attempts
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multiple failed login attempt account lockouts.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Password Hints
extracted_playbook.description: Disable password “hints.”

extracted_playbook.title: Require Administrator Credentials for Software Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrator credentials to install software.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Phishing-Resistant MFA for Critical Services
extracted_playbook.description: Require phishing-resistant multifactor authentication (MFA) for all services to the extent possible, particularly for webmail, VPNs, and accounts that access critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems and Software Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all operating systems, software, and firmware up to date. Prioritize patching known exploited vulnerabilities in internet-facing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Segment Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to prevent the spread of ransomware by controlling traffic flows between subnetworks and restricting adversary lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify and Investigate Abnormal Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Identify, detect, and investigate abnormal activity and potential traversal of ransomware with a network monitoring tool.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Update Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install, regularly update, and enable real-time detection for antivirus software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports and Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports and protocols.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Email Banner for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside your organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Hyperlinks in Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Disable hyperlinks in received emails.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Backup Data is Encrypted and Immutable
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all backup data is encrypted, immutable, and covers the entire organization’s data infrastructure.
